issue.title: [Rust] Implement DoubleEndedIterator for NullableIter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10055](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10055). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reversing doesn't take place for nullable iter for dictionary keys, so keys can't be reversed or rfolded.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10055?focusedCommentId=17199683) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8233
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8233>
